title.rendered: Daysheets, stock draws available on ProRodeo.com

content.rendered:
COLORADO SPRINGS, Colo. (July 29, 2021) – The Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association® is proud to announce daysheets and stock draws from most PRCA rodeos are now available on ProRodeo.com.

This newly added feature provides fans and members the opportunity to see when and where contestants are competing, along with the stock they’ve drawn.

Watch NFR 2023 Live Online - SUBSCRIBE HERE

NFR 2023 Streaming info
Streaming
The Cowboy Channel (real-time) Watch Here
RFD-TV (real-time) Watch Here
Cowboy Channel Plus (International) Watch Here

 

RELATED: Schedule of upcoming PRCA rodeos

“We’ve been working toward this goal for several years. Our fans, members and media all benefit from having this information on their phones whether they are attending the rodeo or following along on our Cowboy Channel broadcasts,” said Amy Fast, PRCA digital assets manager.

Daysheets are listed in two areas. For upcoming rodeos, they are listed in the rodeo schedule. For rodeos in progress or completed, they are listed in rodeo results.

Enhanced features in the rodeo profile also include links to the rodeo’s website, tour status and the date the rodeo joined the PRCA.

Source: ProRodeo

For more information for Wrangler NFR, please visit www.nfrexperience.com. and ProRodeo.com Check out our latest news at www.fd-uat-autopayroll-app.apps.dfes.wa.gov.au or through social media at /LasVegasNFR and use #WranglerNFR.
